title: Interface Design
content:
Over the years, I’ve crafted user flows, diagrams, and high-fidelity mockups to support stakeholder alignment, user testing, and seamless developer handoff. My approach adapts to the needs of the team whether it’s sparking collaboration, clarifying intent, or specifying functionality.

  • Clickable Prototypes
  • Hi-Fidelity Mockups
  • Mockup + Diagram Hybrids (pictured)
  • Mockup + Developer Specs

title: Design, Branding & AI
content: I integrate AI tools into my design workflow to accelerate visual ideation and concept development. These outputs are then thoughtfully refined to ensure they’re brand-specific, relevant, and aligned with each business’s visual identity and communication goals.

title: User Testing & Optimization
content:
Partnered with marketing and analytics teams to conduct user research, usability testing, and A/B experiments turning insights into actionable improvements that drove measurable revenue growth.

I offer consulting on:

  • Optimization Strategy & Experiment Design
  • Usability Testing
  • Ideation & Co-Creation Workshops
  • Test Planning, Execution, and Analysis
